text: Grandes écoles are specialized universities in France. Each grande école only teaches a very limited number of subjects. Unlike the other universities in France, the grandes écoles can pick the students they admit. These students have to follow special courses and tests before they are admitted. The grandes écoles award degrees that correspond to a master's degree; they do not award bachelor's degrees. There is no exhaustive list, but in general, there are the following types of grandes écoles, along with some of the representative schools in each category: *Sciences: École normale supérieure *Engineering: École polytechnique, École centrale Paris, Mines ParisTech, Institut National des Sciences Appliquées *Aviation: École nationale de l'aviation civile, Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées *Politics and public administration: Institut d'études politiques de Paris, École nationale d'administration *Business: École des hautes études commerciales de Paris, Emlyon Business School *Military: École Navale, École de l'Air *Veterinary:, such as the École nationale vétérinaire d'Alfort *Archival science: École nationale des chartes Category:Education in France
title: Grande école
